backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing marketplace data models, access control, and CRUD-style queries for products, shops, categories, reviews, custom orders, wishlists, favorites, and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to impacted files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human‑written summaries of key frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the React app root and main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup including routing, theme provider, authentication check, and profile‑setup handling.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary component that catches rendering errors and shows a reload prompt.
frontend/src/components/BackendErrorNoti: Reusable component displaying backend call errors with optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCard.tsx: UI card linking to a category page using category id and name.
frontend/src/components/CustomOrderButto: Button and dialog enabling authenticated users to submit custom order requests to a shop.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright info and Caffeine.ai attribution with dynamic hostname tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component that handles login/logout via Internet Identity and displays navigation links including conditional wishlist access.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Renders a product card with image, tags, price, and optional wishlist removal functionality.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their name using a profile creation mutation.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Displays product reviews, average rating, and a form for authenticated users to submit new reviews.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, categories, reviews, wishlist items, and user profiles via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays products filtered by selected category with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows hero, categories, featured products, and featured shops with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Renders detailed product info, shop link, reviews, wishlist actions, and image handling.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Displays a shop’s info, announcements, and its products with error and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows the user’s wishlist, requiring login and supporting loading and error conditions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, features, issues, and metadata for a handmade marketplace build plan.
